website_summaries.verdict: If you want a camera that uses AA batteries and has a long zoom lens for a low price, pick up a Kodak EasyShare Z5010 before they're gone for good.
pros: The Kodak EasyShare Z5010 is an inexpensive megazoom camera that's simple to use and runs on AA-size batteries
cons: The Z5010 needs plenty of light to take a good photo and its shooting performance is on the slow side

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: A friebd recommended this camera. Her pictures are good, so maybe it's just me. The camera doesn't seem to take sharp, clear photos and isn't as responsive as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Belray

customer_reviews.title: We were so comfortable with the software that we didn't want to spend ...
customer_reviews.text: The reason we purchased this camera is that our old one finally gave out. We were so comfortable with the software that we didn't want to spend allot of money to adjust to another new program. However, it is sad that Kodak went out of business. When this camera fails it will probably be time for us to totally update our computer (XP). This purchase was a crutch to get us to the next level. As for the camera itself, it takes the best pictures and I will miss it when I have to find an equal.
customer_reviews.author: Granny "K"

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because of Kodak discontinuing their cameras and I loved my older Kodak camera. This camera takes great pictures and I'm really happy with the results. Just like some of the other reviews pictures in low lighting are grainy sometimes even with the flash and the flash does take a minute to reset. This camera also does NOT have a manual view-finder; only the LCD screen. My older Kodak also had a lens shroud to use in bright outdoor lighting and this one does not have one nor does it allow my older one to attach to this model. All in all, very happy. Just what I expected and wanted. A high megapixel camera on the cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B

customer_reviews.title: A very professional camera for those who really aren't but would like to be
customer_reviews.text: I have gone from novice to really really good thanks to the ease and the craftsmanship of this little camera. It's big enough to do a professional job and yet small enough for a small woman to heft it around all day without a bit of problem. I am so glad I found it...Kodak has been a favorite of mine for years anyway, guess it will remain that for many more to come!
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME AWESOME AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: for what you get with this camera it should cost twice as much i usually want buy a camera that runs off double a batterIES i like lithium myself but i bought it for all the features and the price and since it came with 4 double a batteries and a charger it really didnt matter if it was lithium well im not gonna get long winded on all the spec but believe me well wourth it everything works as it should
customer_reviews.author: mtfreaky

customer_reviews.title: Took this on a trip to Europe and it worked great; the 21x zoom was very useful
customer_reviews.text: This was used but I couldn't find as much as a scratch on it.Took this on a trip to Europe and it worked great; the 21x zoom was very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: not so happy
customer_reviews.text: Well the camera looked in good conditions and when I began taking pictures.the first day the camera was out of focus was not able to get it to focus I then turned it off then back on it was focus but then when I tried sharing the picture to Facebook was not working. The next day when I tried to take more pictures it was just out not able to get focus and the picture were verry blurry. But the customer service was awsome.
customer_reviews.author: Aminta Dixon-Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I have had Kodak cameras in the past and have LOVED them. This one, however, I very much didn't love. Compared to my other Kodak cameras, I found this one big, heavy, and bulky. As for the way it worked, I found it very slow, which is the main reason I returned the camera. Even on sports or children modes it took forever for it to process after a picture was taken, therefore making it take forever before the next picture could be taken. For the pictures I take, I want to be able to take pictures closer together than what this allowed. As for quality of pictures, don't know, haven't had any printed yet.
customer_reviews.author: Cori Pahnke

customer_reviews.title: Kodak Z510
customer_reviews.text: All in One' Camera and videos' with handy share button, that you can instantly share photos with family and friends' takes outstanding photos very easy to use, but is a bit bulky and big' so it is not easy to carry around. But that is the price you pay for better photos. Nice big viewing screen. very nice zoom in as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought it mainly because a friend had one, and the price was just right what I wanted to spend for a camera, and I didn't want to buy a point and shoot one, It's great taking pictures in any situation, the zoom and macro functions are great and the battery consumption is excellent even with a lot of flash taking pictures. No complains at all.
customer_reviews.author: Karoshi

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: I received he camera right away and bought it as like new and it was in pristine condition. I got it because of the zoom, 21x's It does weigh a little more than my pocket, and a little bulkier but the zoom is why I got it. It has a slight delay to take the photos but I like Kodak cameras and their software. This company sent it right away and was in exactly the condition they stated, I would recommend this camera and company.
customer_reviews.author: dianna decoste

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I had an older version of this camera and used it for about 5 years. My son borrowed it while riding horse and accidentally broke it. It was the best camera so I replaced it with this one and am very happy with my purchase. Good quality for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: THIS CAMERA IS VERY EASY TO OPERATE.THE PICTURES ARE BEAUTIFUL.INDOOR PICTURES TURN OUT GREAT.NICE ZOOM.I RECOMMEND THIS CAMERA TO EVERYONE ESPECIALLY TO SENIOR CITIZENS BECAUSE OF ITS EASY OPERATION AND QUALITY PICTURES.CAMERA DOES THE JOB ONE HUNDRED PERCENT.
customer_reviews.author: Terry LeeTusing

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled amatuer photographer
customer_reviews.text: I so thrilled with my recent purchase of my new digital camera. We have some beautiful little creatures in our back yard, squirrels, all kinds of birds, hummingbirds, flowers, I truly love photo taking of all kinds. I have a smaller little kodak camera that has been great but my photos of the hummingbirds have been blurry because the zoom was not good enough on my little camera. the kodak z5010 has already been awesome. I am more than happy with it so far. The camera has been easy to use and the photos are just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera, it is easy to use. The pictures are very good. I like the zoom feature. The only draw back is that it doesn't have a peep site.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald S. Bringle

customer_reviews.title: Basic Camera
customer_reviews.text: One step up from a pocket camera, this larger camera has a very functional manual mode, and may be considered a "stepping-stone" camera towards the eventual use of a DSLR. Good functionality and weight, high quality images, and just better overall than a standard point-and-shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel McCafferty

customer_reviews.title: kodak easy share
customer_reviews.text: this is an awsome camra, I bought mine a year ago and my daughter loved it so I got her one but hers is better but oh well I still love the camera easy to use and take great pictures
customer_reviews.author: bman

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot. Practical.
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a cheaper family camera that was nice enough, but not so nice we would be sick if our son happened to break it (he'd broken other cameras 2 already). It's been durable, but lens cap is a bit inconvenient, and quality of dim/dark lighting pics tends to be a bit fuzzy-even with nighttime settings.
customer_reviews.author: The StoryChantress

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This was EXACTLY what I was looking for - an inexpensive, fast camera. The Z5010 delivered. Needed a bit more than my phone delivers and this is super!
customer_reviews.author: successify

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent tool and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I am a photo journalist who writes a published article on a weekly basis. In each article, I use a photo that is the directly tied to the subject of my writings. I have found this camera to be easy to use with a variation of settings that can be used to be creative.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Lamanna

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: liked it till screen broke, then it stopped working after 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: kristine k

customer_reviews.title: Love the pictures.
customer_reviews.text: Have used this camera on one trip so far. Pleased with the beach pictures. Will have a better review after our trip to the canyons nexct year.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: A very large and the kids dropped it once on the carpet and now it shutter is stuck in place so I had to switch back to my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT~!
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific starter camera when a person is learning about the more high end stuff of photography for an awesome price. It's actually launched my side business for photography because there is just so much you can do with it~! The only thing I don't like is that it goes through a lot of batteries so keep many on hand wherever you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Murphy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENTE
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, I was sent the product ordered, in perfect condition and gift 4 batteries with charger, very happy with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent basic camera.  High quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price I paid for it! The picture quality is great as well as the video quality. The only drawback is that I have to remove the lanyard holding the lens cap, while shooting video, because it swings and clicks against the camera housing. A great camera for the novice and experienced photographer alike.
customer_reviews.author: Zigshopper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not good at detailed reviews. This camera works great and the price is very pocket-friendly. I am using it with a 16GB SD card.
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Only one drawback
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera and for the price is a good investment, the only drawback I can observe is that the rechargable batteries that comes with the camera, draws its charge too quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Super Wood

customer_reviews.title: nice!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the quality of the pictures, but the only bad thing, is that it tales a long time before you take the next picture. It takes a delay of approximately 12 seconds to display the picture and be ready to shoot the next one.
customer_reviews.author: G. Y. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: works great. everything came as expected
customer_reviews.text: works great. everything came as expected. I could not believe it was in such great condition for a used camera.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: A great camera for the price. Easy to use and takes great pictures. I bought this camera for daughter to use. My daughter love the camera .
customer_reviews.author: buzzy hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy From Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Kodak Easy Share Z5010 Digital camera. I love it. Easy to use & very durable. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K Swenson

customer_reviews.title: My Kodak Z5010 Review
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the fact that this camera was a great replacement for the one that was stolen from me in March 2012. It is more robust than the Z1012 that I previously owned and with a 32 GB SD card, I can do more photos and longer HD videos with this digital camera. I would suggested rechargeable batteries as this type of camera requires 4 AA batteries to power it.
customer_reviews.author: foolish1193

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Product was as described and was promptly delivered
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ! Product was as described and was promptly delivered!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Daniel E. Crook

customer_reviews.title: Amateur
customer_reviews.text: Good camera and easy for me to use. I am really sorry that Kodak has stopped making this style of camera.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin P. Lookofsky

customer_reviews.title: Great midrange camera with 1 problem
customer_reviews.text: Great midrange camera. Takes pretty good pics and a few stunning ones. 1 problem is that it takes several seconds too long between shots, which can be a bit annoying at times.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: This camera does not take good close-ups of anything. When you zoom in on something the picture gets fuzzy. My other camera was much better. It was also a Kodak easyshare. It was a 3010 and it took amazing pictures. You didn't have the same one so I had to get the 5010. I am not pleased with the quality photos I am getting.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy so much!
customer_reviews.text: I would so recommend this product to everyone. Even though, Kodak has gone out of the business of cameras, they still can be serviced. It is the best camera I have ever had. I take it every where I go. It is a joy and so easy to use. Since I have had it, I have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Kodak EasyShare Z5010 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase, easy to work with, automatic and fun! Love the zoom lens and picture quality. I have two Kodak's and they are great products.
customer_reviews.author: Richard V. Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Z5010
customer_reviews.text: This camera is much more than I expected. It is great - takes good clear pictures and the range from wide angle to distance is unbelievable. The service was also good, very fast and in excellent shape when I received it. Amazon offers great service and stands behind their products with good follow up.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Kodak EasyShare Z5010 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: not as good as my old easy share camera there is a delay between the time you click the button and it actually takes the picture. about half the pictures are fuzzy, out of focus for no reason
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: but I am very satisfied with the pictures I have taken
customer_reviews.text: I am still learning how to use different features on this camera, but I am very satisfied with the pictures I have taken, so far. I would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: 2 read

customer_reviews.title: Can't Ask for More on This Price Tag and This Camera Its Better than That.
customer_reviews.text: Can't find a best camera for this price tag and this camera its even better. Love the pictures quality, love the face recognition system, love the zoom, and love all the customization features. Only bad thing its the picture quality on dark places and on night low light places.
customer_reviews.author: Jeefry Lantigua

customer_reviews.title: Camera- well- OK
customer_reviews.text: Lack of an eyepiece viewer makes shake free photography difficult. With an eyepiece the operators forehead is in contact with and steadies the camera. Without viewer the picture crispness is reduced.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Had a Kodak Easyshare digital camera before but only 10 zoom, this one has a 21 zoom and higher pixels. Pictures are great looking and camera easy to use. Bought it at an excellent price here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A. Ely

customer_reviews.title: Kodak
customer_reviews.text: The price was right. I always bottom-fish on price. People rave about the calrity of my Facebook photo posts. But, the camera does not use the C battery style. RJB
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great shots-love the 21x -easy to operate-now I need a case for it! Would reccommend it highly....I am not to electronically inclined but the directions-labeling on camera makes it easy to take great pictures...
customer_reviews.author: jolo

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. Good fit in the hand, good clear pics, great zoom, doesn't wobble like those small pocket size cameras. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Jane Cook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERYhappy with this camera - takes great pix and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Camera came without batteries, memory card and mode button off and loose. Camera was obviously not inspected before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Taborek

customer_reviews.title: Z5010
customer_reviews.text: Great service shipped quickly and received as advertised, great camera, takes great pictures with or with flash and the telephoto is superior.
customer_reviews.author: sgm030100

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box, put the included batteries in and took clear, crisp pictures! I have had the camera for less than a day and am in love!
customer_reviews.author: Adriene Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for family member and they were very pleased and had great looking pictures.and so easy to upload to computer.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. McNeice

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was extremely pleased with this. She is still learning the many features of the camera. Great gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Product is not good
customer_reviews.text: Much less than kodak Z5120. I give my son a toy. I plan to resell or.It was disappointing. It is sad.
customer_reviews.author: pritbouwe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera
customer_reviews.text: It's just a great and easy to use camera. The quality of the pictures is amazing and i love the optical zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Arimond

customer_reviews.title: Handbook  [Kodak EasyShare Z5010 Digital Camera]
customer_reviews.text: No handbook came with this camera and Kodak wants $15,00 for one and will not help me over the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ben C.

product_meta.title: Kodak EasyShare Z5010 Digital Camera with 21x Optical Zoom - Black
product_meta.description:
Style:Camera Only Kodak EasyShare Camera / Z5010

Product Description

Bring your world closer for everyone to see.With its 21X optical zoom, 25 mm wide-angle lens, Smart Capture, and a fast click-to-capture speed, the Kodak EasyShare Camera / Z5010 makes it easy take stunning images in an instant from any distance. Then, press the Kodak Share button to tag to e-mail, Facebook and more. Just press to impress.

When inspiration strikes, you won’t miss a shot. The Kodak EasyShare Z5010 Camera delivers crisp, beautiful pictures that boost your reputation as the best photographer in the family, if not the neighborhood. Bring your world closer for everyone to see. And once you connect to your PC, your pre-tagged shots will automatically upload to e-mail and your favorite sharing sites with the Kodak Share button app. Just press to impress.


Only KODAK Digital Cameras allow you to simultaneously share to multiple social networks and e-mail1.

Kodak’s Share button makes sharing your videos and pictures as simple with One Button Upload:
• Just press Share when in review mode
• Choose your favorite sharing destinations: Facebook, e-mail, and Kodak PULSE Digital Frames2, and other popular sharing sites
• Connect your camera to your computer or insert your memory card and your videos or pictures are automatically uploaded to the destination(s)1

Kodak’s exclusive Share Button:
• Automatically shares when you connect to a PC1
• Tags to the largest number of socialnetworks3
• Uploads friend tags to Facebook
• Automatically saves up to 20 people tags
• Instantly recognizes up to five faces in a single image
•Makes finding and tagging friends easy


Features: 
Scene and color modes: Get great shots time after time with multiple scene modes, including ortrait, landscape, flower, night portrait, night landscape, fireworks, self-portrait, high-ISO, children, backlight, candlelight, sunset, sport, stage, panorama, and bright

Shoot video the moment it happens:HD video recording is right at your fingertips with our convenient dedicated video record button, which allows you to capture 720p HD

Program and manual mode: Allows you to adjust nearly every aspect of your image, such as: color, white balance, focus, exposure, ISO, shutter speed, aperture, and more

On-camera video and picture editing: Allows you to trim and convert video into action stills up to 9 frames as well as crop, picture rotate, and apply Kodak Perfect Touch for ultimate sharing

Beautiful pictures, more often—automatically
Powerful 21X Wide-Angle Optical Zoom. The 21X SCHNEIDER-KREUZNACH VARIOGON Wide-Angle Optical Zoom Lens (25 mm equivalent) was designed to zoom in closer and faster to deliver crisp, steady shots for extrordinary creative performance.

Kodak's Smart Capture feature: Beautiful pictures, more often-automatically
Become a better photographer with a smarter camera. Kodak’s innovative Smart Capture feature automatically identifies the scene and adjusts camera settings for a great picture in just about any environment
• Intelligent scene detection—analyzes the scene to give you better pictures under various conditions
• Intelligent capture control—automatically adjusts camera exposure, focus, and ISO for clear pictures in any environment, even in low light
• Intelligent image processing—reduces noise and clears up dark shadows for vibrant, crisp details and true-to-life colors


What’s In the Box: Everything you need to shoot and share 
• Package Contents
• Kodak EasyShare Camera / Z1050
• (4) Kodak Ultra Alkaline Batteries AA
• Lens cap
• User Guide

Warranty: One Year

1 All Kodak digital still and video cameras manufactured in 2011 or later.
2 KODAK PULSE Display supports still pictures; video not supported.
3 Sharing sites vary by region
feature_bullets: SCHNEIDER-KREUZNACH, 21X Optical Zoom with Optical Image Stabilization
